sentences.english: The incidence of primary pancreatic tuberculosis may be increasing;
sentences.chinese: 目前，原发性结核性胰脏炎有渐增的趋势。

sentences.english: The optimal postoperative treatment for patients with resectable pancreatic cancer has not yet been determined.
sentences.chinese: 接受切除胰脏癌患者最佳的术后治疗，目前仍未确定。

sentences.english: Returning to the right kidney find the descending duodenum and the pancreas.
sentences.chinese: 回到右肾，找到下行十二指肠，与胰脏。

sentences.english: Hepatopancreas played an important role in storage and detoxification of heavy metals.
sentences.chinese: 肝胰脏是重要储藏重金属及其解毒之器官。

sentences.english: Swayze was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer in January 2008.
sentences.chinese: 帕特里克于2008年1月被确诊患有胰脏癌。

sentences.english: Over nine years, 208 were diagnosed with pancreatic cancer.
sentences.chinese: 九年期间，两百零八人被诊断出胰脏癌。

sentences.english: Insulin and pancreatin was extracted with neutral alcohol from swine pancreas.
sentences.chinese: 用中性乙醇从猪胰脏提取了胰岛素和较高活力的胰酶。

sentences.english: The pancreas releases a massiveamount of insulin to mop up the excess.
sentences.chinese: 胰脏会分泌出大量胰岛素收拾过量的血糖。

sentences.english: Pancreatic lobule, whose endocrine portion has many capillary vessel, is not developed.
sentences.chinese: 胰脏的小叶界限不清，内分泌部有丰富的毛细血管。

sentences.english: The pancreas cells show activity of non specific esterase, weak proteinase and lipase.
sentences.chinese: 胰脏腺细胞呈非特异性酯酶和弱的蛋白酶和脂酶活性。

sentences.english: I didn't even know what a pancreas was.
sentences.chinese: 我那时甚至都不知道胰脏是什么。

sentences.english: Objective: Insulinoma is the most common functional neuroendocrine tumor of the pancreas.
sentences.chinese: 胰岛素瘤为胰脏最常见的神经内分泌瘤。

sentences.english: Fatal pancreatitis secondary to intramural duodenal hematoma is very rare.
sentences.chinese: 十二指肠壁内血肿合并致命性胰脏炎是相当罕见的。

sentences.english: The boundary of liver lobule and pancreatic lobule was obscure.
sentences.chinese: 肝脏和胰脏的小叶界限不清晰。

definition: see 郎格罕氏島|郎格罕氏岛[Lang2 ge2 han3 shi4 dao3]
